Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.3-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.3-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.7.3-7, affected by CVE-2024-24786
